channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FBI says 8 injured in Colorado attack by man with makeshift flamethrower who yelled ‘Free Palestine’
item.description: The FBI says a man with a makeshift flamethrower yelled “Free Palestine” and hurled an incendiary device into a crowd that had assembled to raise attention for Israeli hostages held in Gaza.

item.title: What we know about the suspect and victims in the Boulder, Colorado, attack
Thousands evacuated in 3 provinces as Canadian wildfires threaten air quality into some US states
